FuncDef: The undo bfd command deletes a specified BFD session and cancels the binding between a BFD session and a peer IP address. The undo bfd command deletes a specified BFD session and cancels the binding between a BFD session and a peer IP address. By default, the binding between a BFD session and a peer address is not deleted.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a BFD session.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: [*HUAWEI] bfd test bind peer-ip 10.1.1.1 interface 100GE 1/0/1 one-arm-echo
